title: BD Technical
author: BD Technical
content: One of my older brothers bought bitcoin with that money, instead of keeping it in the bank, about 6 months ago, the price of bitcoin was 24-25k+, and he bought about 1 BTC. The price of bitcoin has increased to 34K+. In just 6 months, he has made a profit of 9k+ dollars, which would have taken more than 20 years to get from the bank. This means that bitcoin can become a millionaire if people invest in it at the right time. I also bought some bitcoins myself and did it by withdrawing money from the bank. Success is not possible if you do not take risks in life. I know how hard it is to make money and if it is to sweat your head and work day and night, then it is worth it. And we can make a lot of income by buying or trading bitcoin with the right rules. I think bitcoin is a bright future for us.

comments.body: Quote from: BD Technical on October 26, 2023, 02:10:53 AMOne of my older brothers bought bitcoin with that money, instead of keeping it in the bank, about 6 months ago, the price of bitcoin was 24-25k+, and he bought about 1 BTC. This means that bitcoin can become a millionaire if people invest in it at the right time.Investment can bring profit or loss. If you start in a bear market, exit in a bear market, likely your net investment will be loss, not profit. If you start around a bull run, exit in a bull run, I am sure you will get profit. Like your old brothers did and got recently.But risk is risk and it is not small. DCA can help you to invest more money in Bitcoin and can help you to get profit. Only invest (with DCA), don't trade.Use that website for DCA https://costavg.com/Dollar Cost Averaging with costavg.com include exchange feeThat website is great because it includes withdrawal fees from exchange. You should not leave your bitcoins on centralized exchanges.Reminder: do not keep your money in online accounts

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Yes, it is possible to build a career with Bitcoin. It cannot be said that Bitcoin can be used as a profession, but of course you can make a successful investment in the long term.If you want to have a career and a monthly income from Bitcoin, you must start your own project and work to make it successful in order to obtain a monthly income.As for simply investing in Bitcoin without building your own project, it is different from a career because you buy and wait for a rise, and this may take months or years. Therefore, in long-term investment, it is not possible to rely on Bitcoin to obtain a career and a fixed monthly income.

comments.author: Texac
comments.body: Quote from: BD Technical on October 26, 2023, 02:10:53 AM I think bitcoin is a bright future for us.Yes, bitcoin is a bright future for us but if you only want to rely on investing in bitcoin to generate income then it will not be a good idea.  because there is no investment without risk, especially bitcoin is a high-risk investment.  luckily, bitcoin has increased in price significantly and helped your brothers make a profit, but if it suddenly drops in price, what will happen to you and your brother?  bitcoin doesn't always go up in price, and during those down times, how will you and your brother survive without another source of income?  have you ever thought about that? To me, building a career by investing and trading bitcoin seems like a pretty bad idea.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: I guess he just got lucky this time in turning his investment into a profit of 9k. Imagine if the price of Bitcoin had not pumped and if the market had a negative approach then he might have incurred loss on his investment. I agree without taking risks you cannot achieve your goal but always take calculated risks. Investing in Bitcoin won't help you in building your career, as there is nothing guaranteed. Investing in Bitcoin and holding on for a period of years will only guarantee good returns on your investment.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: What's a career for you, by the way? Your career gives you regular income. Bitcoin doesn't. On that basis alone, Bitcoin can't be made into a career. Bitcoin may be an investment; investment cannot be made a career, however. Bitcoin may give you money, but it doesn't mean it's already a career. A career is like an occupation. Bitcoin cannot be like that. Your brother made a good amount of money from Bitcoin within 6 months. But it could also happen that your Bitcoin investment won't give you a positive return for years. There's a reason why Bitcoin is considered a long-term investment.

comments.body: Banks give a profit from 2% to 5%, and sometimes 10%, so a profit of 9 thousand dollars from 26,000 will not take 9 years, but much less than that, but inevitably in the bull market, which comes every four years, it is an easy opportunity to double the money at least twice, as it is likely that The price rose to more than 90 thousand dollars, and thus, in less than two years, he was able to turn 24-25k+ into +90.DCA is a good method if he does not have sufficient capital and achieves a reasonable increase in capital at all times.

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: Blockchain developer would probably suit you if you want to make a career out of bitcoin or you can probably do this thing where you ask the management or the payroll of your company that you're working on to pay you in bitcoins, that technically counts as you building a career with bitcoin since you're getting paid with bitcoin. So to answer your question, yes it's possible to build a career in bitcoin.
